460070.name: TANE DLC: QJ Steam Locomotive
460070.description:
This endless coal run session allows you to experience one of the most powerful Chinese locomotives ever made, the QJ. This package includes a massive amount for you to get the full experience of the QJ.

Features
- 5 x QJ locomotives with different details, covered typical styles both China’s and America’s
- The most powerful type of steam locomotive of China!
- Challenge top-end operational experience!
- Historic appearance of QJ locomotives!
- Customized engine parts
- Lifelike appearance with detailed models and textures
- A variety of effects and functions like Auto-Connect Air Brake Hoses, Auto-Numbering, Animated Bell, Changeable Running Lanterns, Optional Parts For Appearance, Extra Operable Functions For Cab-Controlling (- the boiler blowdown is controlled by ‘blowdown_lever’ in cab. Startup by pull up lever and shut down by push down) - the cylinder drain is controlled by two pedals, pushdown once the ‘cylinder_cock_on’ to startup draining, then push down once the ‘cylinder_cock_off’ to stop draining.) and Corresponding ‘Smoke Effects’ in Each Loco’s Config

The QJ was a type of heavy freight steam locomotive used by China Railways. The majority were made by Datong locomotive factory. The prototypes and early production of the class were designated HP, being redesignated as FD class during the cultural revolution before becoming the QJ class in 1971.
The class became the primary mainline freight locomotive on the Chinese rail network by the 1980s, and were then displaced by diesel locomotives during the 1990s. After the end of steam on the national Chinese railway network many QJ locomotives were used on industrial lines, as well as on the Jitong railway. Several of the class have been preserved.

Package includes
- Endless coal run session.
- CHN QJ Steam Classic (locomotive, with operable interior)
- CHN QJ Steam Earlier (locomotive, with operable interior)
- CHN QJ Tender 4-Axle Earlier (rolling stock, with loadable function)
- CHN QJ Tender 6-Axle Classic(rolling stock, with loadable function)
- CHN QJ Tender 6-Axle Earlier(rolling stock, with loadable function)
- QJ IAIS 6988 Steam (locomotive, with operable interior)
- QJ IAIS 6988 Tender (rolling stock, with loadable function)
- QJ IAIS 7081 Steam (locomotive, with operable interior)
- QJ IAIS 7081 Tender (rolling stock, with loadable function)
- QJ RJ Corman 2008 Steam (locomotive, with operable interior)
- QJ RJ Corman 2008 Tender (rolling stock, with loadable function)
- Engineer Mr. James (passenger, specific driver character for US QJ steam locos)
- Engineer Mr. Meng (passenger, specific driver character for Chinese QJ steam locos)
460070.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 波兰语
